structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: Charges for services which clearly benefit individual participants, such as accounting services or preparation of reports for individual participants, shall be paid for by the individual participant.
The board shall approve all charges prior to payment. In no event shall charges pursuant to subsection (1)(a) of this section exceed one percent (1%) of the principal amount of the fund.

law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1980.
